Text:
why can't scenes live like a family???
i don't like these cat fights between them and to skidrow.... i respect your work, but please dont point out flaws in other releases, you did the same thing with flt.....anyways thanks for this one...although i wouldn't be playing this game again...and remember no more fights..;)
thanks for another great upload +1 rep
Its a bit of friendly rivalry nice one the skidster

@mitulv: Scene releases has always been about competition - who can crack this or that and Nuked releases etc They don`t do it for us the users but who can crack different protections first. 

Maybe different today but that is what started it....
@Tino64...ya you are right....well someday maybe the scenes will think about users and not about being the no.1 cracker...
It doesnt work for me I copy all the crack contents and place them in the installer folder and nothing it copies over everything but it shuts down the game after I try and click into it .
Everything works except It says I need d3dx9_37.dll to play where can i get this?
Nevermind I got it and every other .dll files! If you need them here they are... http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6474357

This crack is crap it undoes all the fixes that razor1911 fixes. The only thing i had problems wiht was the difficulty level being always on the hardest level. this one breaks the quicktime events and everything else
